workspace 1.0.0

Package index

All functions

PathBuilder
Path Builder allow to build path from components A root path, optional prefixes and a suffix (path inside the root) It manages the path creation for the global out path Path can be created from several components with the general form root / [prefixes] / suffix prefixes are optional The Builder can also use an absolute mode, using directly a full path, in this mode the components are not used
add_out_path_prefix()
Register a path prefix for the global out path
create_path()
Generate a path with path components without updating the builder
.out_path
Global out path
find_workspace()
Find workspace root
get_root_out_path()
Get the global base output path
global_out_path()
Access the global out path instance
init_path()
Define subpath (suffix) of global out path, usable by my_path()
init_workspace()
Initialize a workspace
is_workspace_booted()
Get the booted state of the workspace
launch()
Launch the workspace
load_R_file()
Load a R file by search for .R and .r version, the first found is loaded (if .R exists, the .r version is ignored)
my_path()
Return the path of a file in the global out path
print(<path_components>)
Print path components
set_root_out_path()
Define the global base output path
workspace workspace-package
Workspace Package
workspace_state()
Define state of the package
